divs: Sighting DetailsTHAT IS IT IT WAS LIKE A DISK VERY QUIET, IT HAD COLOR LIGHTS IT WAS VERY LOW LIKE ON THE GROUND OR TREE LINE, NO SOUND AND THAT IS IT. THE NEXT DAY, A SMALL PLANE APPEARED IN THE SKY AND WENT IN CIRCLES (THE AREA )FOR THREE DAYS, WE WATCHED IT AND IT WOULD GET RELIEVED BY ANOTHER SMALL PLANE THIS WENT ON FOR THREE DAYS. WHY WAS THAT SMALL PLANE THERE SO WHAT I SAY WAS REAL AND SOMEONE ELSE SAW IT WHY WOULD THAT PLANE DO THAT FOR DAYS.??? THANK YOU I THINK A SMALL BEING CAME IN MY HOUSE LATER THAT NIGHT BUT I THINK I MAY HAVE IMAGINED IT. I ONLY SAW A SHAWDOW THE MONTH AND DATE ARE IFFY, THIS HAPPENED ALONG TIME AGO
Summary: THE NEXT DAY A SMALL PLANE CIRCLED THE SKY FOR THREE DAYS
trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Tucson
There were no other sightings in Tucson on or around August 15th 2007
